references.name: Bart van Slobbe - Head of Digital and Media PSA Peugeot, Citroën and DS Benelux
references.reference: Pedro has contributed many insightful and helpful articles to the travel guides of WritingTravellers.com. He is attentive to detail and takes his audience into consideration, writing travel articles for their benefit, by finding new travel experiences and rejuvenating the hot spots with new angles and perspectives. I'm glad to have his contributions and recommend him as a travel writer to anyone looking for depth, meaning and purpose from their writers. Furthermore I hope he will keep on writing on the WritingTravellers guide books!

references.name: Mathias Nöbauer - Sales Manager for Cloud & Enterprise at Microsoft
references.reference: Pedro is a great colleague to work with! He is adaptive, customer-oriented and has a lot of practical experience in the area of HP PPM (Project- and Portfolio Management).

references.name: Wahab Hamiani - Senior Global Program Manager
references.reference: Pedro is a very professional, knowledgeable and personable team member. He added value to all the projects that I managed by working closely with the client and the other team members and by being a leader.

references.name: Brian McQuillan - Senior Product Manager at ServiceNow – The Enterprise Cloud Company
references.reference: Pedro was a pleasure to work with. He never shirks a challenge and doesn't complain when the going gets tough. His professional 'can do' attitude has helped enusure that the projects he worked on were successes both for the company and the customer. I highly recommend him.

references.name: James Nelson - Sr. Project Manager at Nevada System of Higher Education

He is very approachable and knowledgable in his field. I would work with him any day and hire him if I owned an IT company....or any company for that matter.

references.name: Michael Hansen - Principal IT Systems Engineer at Pacific Gas and Electric Company

He possesses the rare combination of excellent technical skills and even better people skills. He is hard working, considerate of others, and extremely honest. I would feel confident using Pedro’s services in any field that he decides to peruse.
